title: Some Hospitals Drop Covid-19 Vaccine Mandates to Ease Labor Shortages
content:
1. Some Hospitals Drop Covid-19 Vaccine Mandates to Ease Labor Shortages  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Biden Administration files motion to 'stay' fed. contractor vaccine mandate case in Louisiana  WAFB
  3. Tensions mount as employers await a court decision on Biden's vaccine mandates  The Philadelphia Inquirer
  4. Idaho played role in stalling three proposed federal vaccine mandates  Idaho Press
  5. Oak Ridge National Lab suspends vaccine requirement  WATE 6 On Your Side
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 人手不足解消のため、コビド-19ワクチン接種を義務化しない病院が登場
一些医院为缓解劳动力短缺问题而放弃了接种Covid-19疫苗的要求
一些醫院爲緩解勞動力短缺問題而放棄了接種Covid-19疫苗的要求
